org.forgerock.openam.entitlement.rest

Interface PolicyParser

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JsonPolicyParser

    public interface PolicyParser
    Interface for parsing policies from some resource representation.
    Since:
    12.0.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Privilege parsePolicy(String id, org.forgerock.json.JsonValue representation)
      Parses the given JSON policy representation into an entitlements policy (privilege).
      org.forgerock.json.JsonValue printEntitlement(Entitlement entitlement)
      Converts an entitlement decision into JSON.
      org.forgerock.json.JsonValue printEntitlements(List<Entitlement> entitlements)
      Converts a list of policy decisions to a json representation.
      org.forgerock.json.JsonValue printPolicy(Privilege policy)
      Converts an entitlements policy back to the JSON serialisation representation.

    • Method Detail

      • parsePolicy

        Privilege parsePolicy(String id,
                      org.forgerock.json.JsonValue representation)
               throws EntitlementException
        Parses the given JSON policy representation into an entitlements policy (privilege).
        Parameters:
        id - a unique id to assign to the policy.
        representation - the representation of the policy in JSON.
        Returns:
        the equivalent policy.
        Throws:
        EntitlementException - if an error occurs parsing the policy.

      • printPolicy

        org.forgerock.json.JsonValue printPolicy(Privilege policy)
                                  throws EntitlementException
        Converts an entitlements policy back to the JSON serialisation representation.
        Parameters:
        policy - the policy to convert.
        Returns:
        the representation of the given policy.
        Throws:
        EntitlementException

      • printEntitlement

        org.forgerock.json.JsonValue printEntitlement(Entitlement entitlement)
                                       throws EntitlementException
        Converts an entitlement decision into JSON.
        Parameters:
        entitlement - the entitlement to serialise.
        Returns:
        the JSON representation of the entitlement.
        Throws:
        EntitlementException - if an error occurs.

      • printEntitlements

        org.forgerock.json.JsonValue printEntitlements(List<Entitlement> entitlements)
                                        throws EntitlementException
        Converts a list of policy decisions to a json representation.
        Parameters:
        entitlements - the list of policy decisions
        Returns:
        the json representation
        Throws:
        EntitlementException - should an error occur during the transformation
